pages.title: Artemis Soul
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 7 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Very Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Store ender-related stuff in the tool. $(br)Killing entities will save their souls in the tool. $(br)More souls bring higher yields. $(br)Tool has to occasionally feast

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 500 $(br2)Gain more souls each harvest
